data.name: CapuCorp
data.description:
Capu Corp, an enthralling Gtag fan gem, begins its narrative within the enigmatic walls of a secretive facility. Players find themselves navigating a complex web of corridors and hidden chambers, uncovering the dark secrets that Capu Corp conceals. The tension builds as the protagonists peel back the layers of mystery, only to be thrust into an even more unsettling scenario.

The story takes a harrowing turn as the characters descend into a foreboding cave, its depths shrouded in darkness. Within this subterranean realm, a chilling discovery awaits â€“ a bloody and gory monkey, a grotesque embodiment of horror. The cave becomes a visceral and nightmarish setting, challenging players to confront their deepest fears.

As the narrative unfolds in the cave's eerie ambiance, the characters must navigate through a maze of psychological terror, uncovering the unsettling ties between Capu Corp and the grotesque simian presence. The journey is fraught with suspense, unexpected twists, and a pervasive sense of impending doom, creating a captivating experience that will leave players on edge.

Capu Corp promises a rollercoaster of emotions, blending elements of suspense, horror, and mystery. Brace yourself for a gripping tale that transcends the boundaries of conventional storytelling, inviting players to unravel the enigma of Capu Corp and face the gruesome reality lurking within the shadows of the bloody and gory monkey-infested cave.
